attributes.action: Make Industrial Hemp Legal for anyone to grow without a Licence
attributes.additional_details:
Make it Legal for anyone it the UK to grow Industrial Hemp without a Licence as this will benefit the environment and help the economy and the health of the nation , it should never of been made illegal or classed as a drug when it is not a drug Lotus made a car out of it
it has over 25000 uses from food to clothes to paper and plastic with Industrial Hemp Legal for anyone to grow it would boost this countries economy and create more jobs make it Legal Now
